org.jcatapult.security.servlet
Class FacadeHttpServletRequest

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
          org.jcatapult.security.servlet.FacadeHttpServletRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpServletRequest, ServletRequest
public class FacadeHttpServletRequest
extends HttpServletRequestWrapper

This class allows the URI to be completely changed, including support for forwards and includes from a RequestDispatcher.
